item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on an incredibly fun trip to Oktoberfest in Munich, Germany!

Join your fellow club members September 25 - October 2, 2011 on this exciting and rare opportunity to experience Oktoberfest: Munich, Salzburg & The Bavarian Alps! That’s two of Europe's most beautiful cities, PLUS the greatest beer festival in the world, all on one fun filled, 8 day group tour.

This group trip is an awesome way to experience the fun, history, sights and excitement of Oktoberfest and the Alps with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonial Page.

Price: $2,699, pp plus airfare

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Included in the awesome adventure:
* Experience the great Bavarian Oktoberfest
* 7 nights in 3-4 star hotels
* Breakfast daily
* Explore the city of Munich
* Guided tour to Crazy King Ludwig’s Castle (which Disney modeled Cinderella’s castle after)
* Exciting cable car ride to the top of Zugspitze Mountain (Germany's highest peak)
* A guided visit to the famous Eagle's Nest mountain retreat
* Guided ride through the Alps from Munich to Salzburg, Austria
* Explore the famous mountain top castle that has protected the town of Salzburg for centuries and enjoy its wonderful 1,000 person beer garden
* Guided tour of the beautiful city of Salzburg and the home of Mozart, one of the greatest classical composers
* Cruise on the picturesque Lake Hallstraettersee
* Guided day trip out to the Austria’s Lake Region and see the sights made famous by the movie The Sound of Music
* Optional live Mozart concert in Salzburg (available during check out)

Places Visited: Oktoberfest tour, Munich, Germany, Salzburg, Austria, Neuschwanstein Castle, Eagles Nest visit, Zugspitze Mountain, Austrian Lake Region, Sound of Music tour, Lake Hallstraettersee cruise, Ettal Monastery

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 9,000+ members. The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures. For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World®
item.name: Oktoberfest: Munich, Salzburg & The Bavarian Alps - 8 Days
